Html: Do you have plans to include DateTimePicker into WpfToolkit?

Hi Idsa,

We don't have this control on the schedule yet, but we're definitely aware of the need for a DateTimePicker and plan to add one in the future.

Thanks!
Samantha
I also have the need for a DateTimePicker.  It is important that this control also has a TimePicker mode where you don't see the date.
Yes, please add DateTimePicker control. At least we need separate TimePicker
